alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 09 at 11:51AM PDT until October 11 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley, Mojave Desert Slopes and Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 11 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust may reduce visibility at times. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, U.S. Highway 395, Highway 178 below Walker Pass including the town of Inyokern, and Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
